snippet: This is Tiger Woods's 18th Masters, which means he has been playing at Augusta National for half his life. That exposure is priceless, as are the countless tips he has picked up from others during practice rounds over the years.
abstract: This is Tiger Woods's 18th Masters, which means he has been playing at Augusta National for half his life. That exposure is priceless, as are the countless tips he has picked up from others during practice rounds over the years.

headline.main: Sharing Advice, Just Not Too Much
headline.print_headline: A Bit of Advice. Just a Bit.
